Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class AbstractEventElementHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractEventElementHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsEventProvider, AddHandlerEventHandler, EventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventAxesHandler, EventSubtitleHandler, EventTitleHandler
    abstract class AbstractEventElementHandler
extends Object
implements IsEventProvider
    Base class to manage the events on canvas for chart elements, like title and axes.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void checkAndManageCanvasClickListeners​(boolean isAdding, boolean manageListener)
      Checks and manage the canvas event listeners for click events.
      If the argument is true, it will add the event listener if is the first adding, otherwise it will remove the listener if is the last handler.
      (package private) void checkAndManageCanvasHoverListeners​(boolean isAdding, boolean manageListener)
      Checks and manage the canvas event listeners for hover events.
      If the argument is true, it will add the event listener if is the first adding, otherwise it will remove the listener if is the last handler.
      (package private) ConfigurationOptions getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration instance.

      Check if the click event on element of chart and manage it firing the event.
      (package private) abstract void handleHoverEventOnElements​(NativeBaseEvent event)
      Check if the hover event on element of chart and manage it firing the event.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfiguration

        final ConfigurationOptions getConfiguration()
        Returns the configuration instance.
        Returns:
        the configuration instance

      • checkAndManageCanvasClickListeners

        final void checkAndManageCanvasClickListeners​(boolean isAdding,
                                              boolean manageListener)
        Checks and manage the canvas event listeners for click events.
        If the argument is true, it will add the event listener if is the first adding, otherwise it will remove the listener if is the last handler.
        Parameters:
        isAdding - if true, the handlers are added.
        manageListener - if true, is the first or last listener and then it will add or remove event listener to/from canvas.

      • checkAndManageCanvasHoverListeners

        final void checkAndManageCanvasHoverListeners​(boolean isAdding,
                                              boolean manageListener)
        Checks and manage the canvas event listeners for hover events.
        If the argument is true, it will add the event listener if is the first adding, otherwise it will remove the listener if is the last handler.
        Parameters:
        isAdding - if true, the handlers are added.
        manageListener - if true, is the first or last listener and then it will add or remove event listener to/from canvas.

      • handleClickEventOnElements

        abstract void handleClickEventOnElements​(NativeBaseEvent event)
        Check if the click event on element of chart and manage it firing the event.
        Parameters:
        event - event generated on chart

      • handleHoverEventOnElements

        abstract void handleHoverEventOnElements​(NativeBaseEvent event)
        Check if the hover event on element of chart and manage it firing the event.
        Parameters:
        event - event generated on chart

      • handleLeaveEventOnElements

        abstract void handleLeaveEventOnElements​(NativeBaseEvent event)
        Check if the leave event on element of chart and manage it firing the event.
        Parameters:
        event - event generated on chart
